backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing required frontend video/photo asset behavior and documentation mapping.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/ASSET_SETUP.md: Docs detailing required media filenames, upload-to-filename mapping, and behavior for missing assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles with OKLCH color variables and dark-mode theme settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/experience/BirthdayExperien: Controls slide flow, start overlay, and background music coordination across the experience.
frontend/src/experience/components/Firew: Canvas component rendering looping fireworks with particle animations.
frontend/src/experience/components/Heart: Clickable heart-shaped play button with pulse animation triggering video play.
frontend/src/experience/components/Popup: Popup modal showing photo messages with escape-close support.
frontend/src/experience/components/Premi: Animated background with glow circles and drifting balloons using canvas.
frontend/src/experience/components/Slide: Layout wrapper enforcing full-screen centered slide content.
frontend/src/experience/components/Start: Full-screen tap-to-start overlay shown before the experience begins.
frontend/src/experience/hooks/useBackgro: Provides start, pause, and resume controls for looping background audio using refs.
frontend/src/experience/hooks/useCountdo: Implements a countdown timer that triggers a callback when it reaches zero.
frontend/src/experience/hooks/useSequent: Reveals items one by one on a timer and calls a completion callback after all are shown.
frontend/src/experience/slides/Slide0Cou: Displays a 5‑second countdown before advancing to the next slide.
frontend/src/experience/slides/Slide1Tit: Shows a birthday title sequence and reveals a button after a delay.
frontend/src/experience/slides/Slide2Pho: Shows four tappable photos that reveal messages; unlocks Next when all are clicked.
frontend/src/experience/slides/Slide3Vid: Plays the first video with a custom play button and triggers start/end callbacks.
frontend/src/experience/slides/Slide4Vid: Plays the second video similarly, with start/end event callbacks.
frontend/src/experience/slides/Slide5Sha: Sequentially reveals shayari lines across two columns and shows a Next button when done.
frontend/src/experience/slides/Slide6Fin: Displays a button that advances to the final surprise slide.
frontend/src/experience/slides/Slide7Fin: Shows the final heartfelt message with fireworks background.
frontend/src/experience/types.ts: Defines the SlideId union type for all slide identifiers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables for light/dark themes, global styles, and several custom animations for breathing text, countdown, and title effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, animations, typography/container plugins, and extended theme options.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s high-level requirements and architecture for a multi-slide interactive birthday web experience with strict media and layout rules.
